original_text: Then an arrow will go straight into its body and kill it! The young man was like a bird that is flying into a trap. He did not know that his life was in danger.
korean_text: 필경은 화살이 그 간을 뚫게 되리라 새가 빨리 그물로 들어가되 그의 생명을 잃어버릴 줄을 알지 못함과 같으니라

sentences.original_text: Then an arrow will go straight into its body
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 화살이 곧장 그것의 몸으로 들어가고

sentences.original_text: The young man was like a bird
that is flying into a trap
that his life was in danger
